ROOT.GetWarnNoticeList: SELECT OBJ_ID AS ID,BH,XXLB AS DEPT,BZSJ AS TIME,ZT,SY FROM MW_APP.MWT_UD_DWYXGL_FXYJ_SDRFXYJGL WHERE (ZT LIKE '%{0}%' OR SY LIKE '%{0}%') AND JSSJ>{1} AND KSSJ<{2} AND STATE LIKE '%{3}%'
ROOT.GetWarnNoticeLs: select FKDW,LSQK,FKSJ,STATE from MW_APP.MWT_UD_DWYXGL_FXYJ_DDLS WHERE PAR_ORJID={0}
ROOT.GetDayList: SELECT A.OBJ_ID AS ID,A.KSSJ,A.JSSJ,A.ZT,B.ACLINEID,B.STATIONID FROM MW_APP.MWT_UD_DWYXGL_FXYJ_SDRFXYJGL A JOIN ZH_SYS.MWT_UD_FXYJ_WH B ON A.OBJ_ID=B.FXYJID WHERE A.KSSJ<={0} AND A.JSSJ>{0} AND (B.ACLINEID IS NOT NULL OR B.STATIONID IS NOT NULL)
ROOT.GetRangeList: SELECT A.OBJ_ID AS ID,A.KSSJ,A.JSSJ,A.ZT,B.ACLINEID,B.STATIONID FROM MW_APP.MWT_UD_DWYXGL_FXYJ_SDRFXYJGL A JOIN ZH_SYS.MWT_UD_FXYJ_WH B ON A.OBJ_ID=B.FXYJID WHERE A.KSSJ<{1} AND A.JSSJ>{0} AND (B.ACLINEID IS NOT NULL OR B.STATIONID IS NOT NULL)
ROOT.GetD5000_SGC_Relation: SELECT D5000_ID,MXZX_ID FROM OSP_JSCLOUD.nr_object_synchro_record WHERE D5000_ID IN ({0})
